projects.title: Thomas Nicoli Consulting Site
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Marketing Website
projects.purpose: A modern bilingual (EN/ES) consulting website showcasing AI consulting for e-commerce. Features a retrieval-augmented chatbot that answers visitor questions from a curated knowledge base, providing interactive Q&A. Captures leads via contact form with API-based email delivery.
highlights: AI chatbot with OpenAI embeddings and streaming chat
Falls back to local BM25 search when API key unavailable
Lead capture with Resend API integration
projects.deployment: Live deployment on Vercel (serverless). Fully static + serverless functions for optimal performance.

projects.title: Property Finder
projects.subtitle: Offline Real Estate Search Tool
projects.purpose: A local web app for searching real estate listings from offline data cartridges. Users upload ZIP/RAR archives of property data and perform full-text searches with filters (location, property type, price) to get matching listings. Solves the challenge of quickly sifting through large offline property datasets while ensuring complete privacy.
highlights: Efficient search algorithms for fast text querying
Intuitive web interface with Tailwind styling
projects.deployment: Local/offline app distributed as standalone Windows application. Access via localhost:5000.

projects.title: Bingus Geocoder
projects.subtitle: Batch Geocoding Assistant with AI
projects.purpose: A playful batch geocoding application for addresses in Excel files. Uses Nominatim geocoder to find coordinates for each address. Features an AI assistant ('Bingus') that corrects or interprets problematic addresses and retries geocoding. Streamlines bulk address lookup with AI assistance for edge cases like typos or incomplete addresses.
highlights: Fun, colorful design with engaging UX
projects.deployment: Local or self-hosted. Run on localhost:5000 for personal or demo use.

projects.title: SiteSync Pro
projects.subtitle: Enterprise Content Downloader (SFCC)
projects.purpose: Web app for downloading and packaging HTML content from password-protected Salesforce Commerce Cloud staging sites. Enables easy export of multiple page HTML files for backups, content syncing, or offline review. Automatically handles authentication and bulk-downloads pages into a ZIP file, saving significant time for developers and content managers.
highlights: Async job queue with status tracking
Deployable on Netlify, Heroku, or Railway
projects.deployment: Cloud deployable with Netlify Functions or traditional hosting. Designed for internal enterprise use.

projects.title: AI-Enhanced Instagram Automation
projects.subtitle: Smart Social Bot
projects.purpose: Intelligent automation system for Instagram using AI-driven decision-making. Analyzes follower profiles with AI to determine optimal interactions, managing Close Friends lists strategically. Maintains stealth with human-like behavior patterns, prioritizing account safety over aggressive automation to grow networks smartly while avoiding detection.
highlights: Stealth browser management for bot detection avoidance
projects.deployment: Run locally as command-line tool. Requires personal IG credentials and API key for AI features.

projects.title: SFCC Inspector
projects.subtitle: AI Code Analysis for Salesforce Commerce Cloud
projects.purpose: AI-powered tool helping non-developers inspect and understand SFCC project code. Connects to live SFCC instances via WebDAV to browse cartridge code structure. Presents VSCode-like file explorer with integrated AI that generates plain-language explanations of code purpose and logic. Demystifies complex SFCC implementations through context-aware summaries and natural language Q&A.
highlights: WebDAV connection to live SFCC instances
projects.deployment: Prototype for internal use. Run locally or on internal servers with valid SFCC credentials.

projects.title: Tattoo Previewer
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Tattoo Visualization
projects.purpose: Interactive tattoo preview service for visualizing tattoos on your body before getting inked. Two-step process: (1) AI transforms inspiration images into tattoo decals in chosen styles (Neo-traditional, Old School, Black & Grey, etc.), (2) AI applies generated tattoo onto body photos for realistic composite previews. Addresses the pain point of imagining end results with AI-driven mockups.
highlights: AI tattoo design generation from inspiration images
Realistic body preview with skin tone/lighting adaptation
Size presets (S-XL) for tattoo scale adjustment
Polished UI with progress meters and error handling
projects.deployment: Web application (beta). Supabase backend with React client, cloud functions for AI rendering.
